question: How much does this cost?
answer:
There is a $500 deposit to get you sample portfolios and tests from 2 editors.

We apply your deposit to the first month subscription fee if you decide to hire.

Most full-time editors cost $2,995/month. Some premium editors cost $3,995/month.

question: Why hire in the Philippines?
answer:
You can hire an amazing, full-time editor for as little as $36,000 per year in the Philippines.

Your editor will have excellent English, a strong work ethic, and work while you sleep.

question: Will my video editor only work for me?
answer:
Yes. Your editor is on your team.

All editors work full-time for only you. They are just like a regular team member.

question: What about the time difference?
answer: We like to think of the US to Philippines time difference as time travel.You can record and upload raw videos during your day, then wake up to edited videos the next morning. Some clients find it helpful to schedule an hour or two of overlap with their editor to sync-up and handle any quick revisions.

question: How many videos can my editor make?
answer: These are great editors, so they work fast. Exact times depend on a lot of factors – particularly how much footage there is and how many motion graphics are requested.but once you start working with your editor you’ll get a good sense for each other’s workflow and speed. You can work together to dial things in from there.Also, if you provide them with asset databases like Envato Elements, Storyblocks, etc. they’ll be able to work much faster.
